1.onboardingDesc1: Experience powerful tools designed to make your daily tasks easier and enjoy a smooth journey from the moment you start using the app.

2.onboardingDesc2: Navigate effortlessly through a clean and intuitive interface crafted to help every user complete actions quickly and without confusion.

3.onboardingDesc3: Stay engaged with your friends and family through fast access to communication features that keep you close no matter where you are.

Support.howDoesTheAppWorkAnswer: Create a delivery request, receive offers from drivers, choose the best one, and track your delivery in real-time until it arrives safely.
Support.isServiceAvailable247Answer: Yes! Our platform operates 24/7. However, driver availability may vary depending on your location and time of day.
Support.whatAreasDoYouCoverAnswer: We currently cover all major cities in Iraq. Check the app to see if service is available in your specific area.
Support.howToCreateRequest: How do I create a delivery request?
Support.howToCreateRequestAnswer: Tap "New Request", enter load weight and description, select pickup and delivery locations, choose your preferred date, and submit.
Support.canIEditRequest: Can I edit my request after submitting?
Support.canIEditRequestAnswer: Yes, you can edit your request before any driver accepts it. Go to "My Requests" and tap on the request you want to edit.
Support.whatInfoToIncludeAnswer: Provide accurate weight, detailed description of items, complete pickup/delivery addresses, contact numbers, and any special handling instructions.
Support.canICancelRequestAnswer: Yes, you can cancel before a driver accepts. After acceptance, cancellation may incur fees depending on timing.
Support.howDoOffersWorkAnswer: After creating a request, drivers send you price offers. You can compare offers, check driver ratings, and choose the best option for your needs.
Support.whenDoIPayAnswer: Payment is processed after you accept a driver's offer. You can pay through the app using credit card, bank transfer, or other available methods.
Support.areThereHiddenFeesAnswer: No hidden fees! The price you see in the accepted offer is the final price. Any additional charges must be agreed upon in advance.
Support.notSatisfiedWhatToDo: What if I'm not satisfied with the service?
Support.notSatisfiedWhatToDoAnswer: Contact support immediately. We take all complaints seriously and will work to resolve any issues. Refunds are available in valid cases.
Support.howToTrackDelivery: How can I track my delivery?
Support.howToTrackDeliveryAnswer: Once a driver accepts your request, you can track their live location on the map, see delivery status updates, and communicate via in-app chat.
Support.canIContactDriverAnswer: Yes! Use the in-app chat or call feature to communicate with your driver about pickup times, delivery instructions, or any concerns.
Support.whatIfDriverIsLate: What if the driver is late?
Support.whatIfDriverIsLateAnswer: Contact the driver through the app to check status. If there are significant delays, you can contact support for assistance.
Support.howToConfirmDeliveryAnswer: Once your items arrive safely, confirm delivery in the app. This releases payment to the driver and allows you to rate the service.
Support.learn_how_to_use_app: Learn how to use the app in 4 simple steps
